snippet: The Los Angeles school district will pay millions of dollars to settle dozens of legal actions in an abuse case in which a former teacher is charged with lewd acts on children over five years.
abstract: Los Angeles school district will pay millions of dollars to settle dozens of legal actions in an abuse case in which former teacher Mark Berndt was charged with lewd acts toward children over five years.
